text: This list deals with football rivalries around the world. This includes club teams who compete in local derbies as well as matches between club teams further afield. It also lists international rivalries and rivalries between individual players. ==Individual== ===Rivalries between players=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:98%; width:98%;" |- ! 1st party !! 2nd party !!
